title: Canyonlands National Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      Canyonlands is open year-round, 24 hours a day. Each district has its own visitor center with operating hours that change with the seasons.        NPS  Island in the Sky Visitor Center Island in the Sky Visitor Center is open daily, spring through fall. Backcountry permits are issued up until one hour before closing. The visitor center is closed Thanksgiving Day, December 25, and from late December through early March. Features include: exhibits, book and map sales, backcountry permits, general information, wireless internet, and park rangers on duty.      Island in the Sky Visitor Center Opening Dates Hours    April 24 - September 17, 2016 Open 8 am - 6 pm              NPS  The Needles Visitor Center The Needles Visitor Center is open daily from early March through November. Backcountry permits are issued up to one hour before closing. The visitor center is closed Thanksgiving Day and late November through early March. Features include: exhibits, book and map sales, backcounty permits, general information, wireless internet, picnic area, and park rangers on duty. Water and restrooms are available year-round.    Needles Visitor Center Opening Dates Hours    July 3 - August 2016 Open 8:30 am - 4 pm             NPS  Hans Flat Ranger Station (The Maze) The Hans Flat Ranger Station at the Maze is open daily, year-round. Features include: rangers on duty, general information, backcountry permits, a small sales area with books and maps. There are no services, food, gas, or potable water sources at the Maze.       Hans Flat Ranger Station Opening Dates Hours   Year-round 8 am - 4:30 pm
